a.catalog_code = #{catalog_code} and a.value_code = '11' and a.value_name = 'Y' and a.enable_flag = 'Y')) and cb.catalog_code = #{catalog_code} and cav.attribute_type(+) = cb.attribute_type and cav.catalog_code(+) = cb.catalog_code and cav.attribute_code(+) = cb.attribute_code group by cb.catalog_code

select ca.category_id as inv_category_id ,cg.category_code1 || '.' || cg.category_code2 || '.' || cg.category_code3 as inv_category_code ,cg.category_desc as inv_category_desc ,cg1.cost_category_id as cost_category_id ,cg1.cost_category_code1 || '.' || cg1.cost_category_code2 as cost_category_code ,cg1.cost_category_desc as cost_category_desc ,pf.part_family_code as part_family_code ,pf.part_family_desc as part_family_desc ,ca.uom_code as uom_code ,stx_dis_erp_uom_f(ca.uom_code) as unit_of_measure ,ca.catalog_desc as catalog_desc ,pf.shiptype_flag ,pf.weight_flag from stx_dis_sd_catalog ca ,stx_dis_sd_category cg ,stx_dis_sd_part_family pf ,(select a.category_id as cost_category_id ,a.category_code1 as cost_category_code1 ,a.category_code2 as cost_category_code2 ,a.category_desc as cost_category_desc from stx_dis_sd_category a where a.type_code = '02' and a.enable_flag = 'Y') cg1 where ca.category_id = cg.category_id(+) and ca.part_family_code = pf.part_family_code(+) and cg.category_code1 = cg1.cost_category_code1(+) and cg.category_code2 = cg1.cost_category_code2(+) and ca.catalog_code = #{catalog_code} and pf.enable_flag = 'Y' and cg.enable_flag = 'Y' and ca.enable_flag = 'Y' and rownum = 1

select nvl(max(decode(cb.attribute_code,'01','Y')),'N') as v_attr01 ,nvl(max(decode(cb.attribute_code,'02','Y')),'N') as v_attr02 ,nvl(max(decode(cb.attribute_code,'03','Y')),'N') as v_attr03 ,nvl(max(decode(cb.attribute_code,'04','Y')),'N') as v_attr04 ,nvl(max(decode(cb.attribute_code,'05','Y')),'N') as v_attr05 ,nvl(max(decode(cb.attribute_code,'06','Y')),'N') as v_attr06 ,nvl(max(decode(cb.attribute_code,'07','Y')),'N') as v_attr07 ,nvl(max(decode(cb.attribute_code,'08','Y')),'N') as v_attr08 ,nvl(max(decode(cb.attribute_code,'09','Y')),'N') as v_attr09 ,nvl(max(decode(cb.attribute_code,'10','Y')),'N') as v_attr10 ,nvl(max(decode(cb.attribute_code,'11','Y')),'N') as v_attr11 ,nvl(max(decode(cb.attribute_code,'12','Y')),'N') as v_attr12 ,nvl(max(decode(cb.attribute_code,'13','Y')),'N') as v_attr13 ,nvl(max(decode(cb.attribute_code,'14','Y')),'N') as v_attr14 ,nvl(max(decode(cb.attribute_code,'15','Y')),'N') as v_attr15 from stx_dis_sd_catalog_attribute cb where cb.attribute_type = 'ITEM' and cb.catalog_code = #{catalog_code}

select 'Y' as exist_yn from stx_dis_item it where it.item_catalog = #{catalog_code} and nvl(it.attr1,'##') = nvl(#{attr01_desc},'##') and nvl(it.attr2,'##') = nvl(#{attr02_desc},'##') and nvl(it.attr3,'##') = nvl(#{attr03_desc},'##') and nvl(it.attr4,'##') = nvl(#{attr04_desc},'##') and nvl(it.attr5,'##') = nvl(#{attr05_desc},'##') and nvl(it.attr6,'##') = nvl(#{attr06_desc},'##') and nvl(it.attr7,'##') = nvl(#{attr07_desc},'##') and nvl(it.attr8,'##') = nvl(#{attr08_desc},'##') and nvl(it.attr9,'##') = nvl(#{attr09_desc},'##') and nvl(it.attr10,'##') = nvl(#{attr10_desc},'##') and nvl(it.attr11,'##') = nvl(#{attr11_desc},'##') and nvl(it.attr12,'##') = nvl(#{attr12_desc},'##') and nvl(it.attr13,'##') = nvl(#{attr13_desc},'##') and nvl(it.attr14,'##') = nvl(#{attr14_desc},'##') and nvl(it.attr15,'##') = nvl(#{attr15_desc},'##')

select 'Y' as exist_yn from stx_dis_sd_item_create ic where ic.catalog_code = #{catalog_code} and nvl(ic.attr01,'##') = nvl(#{attr01_desc},'##') and nvl(ic.attr02,'##') = nvl(#{attr02_desc},'##') and nvl(ic.attr03,'##') = nvl(#{attr03_desc},'##') and nvl(ic.attr04,'##') = nvl(#{attr04_desc},'##') and nvl(ic.attr05,'##') = nvl(#{attr05_desc},'##') and nvl(ic.attr06,'##') = nvl(#{attr06_desc},'##') and nvl(ic.attr07,'##') = nvl(#{attr07_desc},'##') and nvl(ic.attr08,'##') = nvl(#{attr08_desc},'##') and nvl(ic.attr09,'##') = nvl(#{attr09_desc},'##') and nvl(ic.attr10,'##') = nvl(#{attr10_desc},'##') and nvl(ic.attr11,'##') = nvl(#{attr11_desc},'##') and nvl(ic.attr12,'##') = nvl(#{attr12_desc},'##') and nvl(ic.attr13,'##') = nvl(#{attr13_desc},'##') and nvl(ic.attr14,'##') = nvl(#{attr14_desc},'##') and nvl(ic.attr15,'##') = nvl(#{attr15_desc},'##')
select part_number_name ,revision ,stxcipher ,stxcurrentnum ,stxmaxnum ,stxminnum from stx_dis_part_number a where part_number_name = #{part_number_name}
select stx_dis_sd_item_create_f(#{catalog_code}, #{v_item_code}, #{shiptype}) as item_req_code from dual
select stx_dis_main_code_f() as main_code from dual
select 'Y' as exist_yn from stx_dis_sd_item_list_up where catalog_code = #{catalog_code} and rownum = 1
mapper.delete: delete from stx_dis_sd_item_list where catalog_code = #{catalog_code} and excel_upload_flag = 'Y' and confirm_flag = 'N' and disable_flag = 'N'
delete from stx_dis_sd_item_list where catalog_code = #{catalog_code} and confirm_flag = 'Y' and disable_flag = 'N'
mapper.select:
select cb.catalog_code as catalog_code ,'WEIGHT' as weight ,'OLD_ITEM_CODE' as old_item_code ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '01', cb.attribute_name))),null) as attr01 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '02', cb.attribute_name))),null) as attr02 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '03', cb.attribute_name))),null) as attr03 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '04', cb.attribute_name))),null) as attr04 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '05', cb.attribute_name))),null) as attr05 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '06', cb.attribute_name))),null) as attr06 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '07', cb.attribute_name))),null) as attr07 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '08', cb.attribute_name))),null) as attr08 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '09', cb.attribute_name))),null) as attr09 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '10', cb.attribute_name))),null) as attr10 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '11', cb.attribute_name))),null) as attr11 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '12', cb.attribute_name))),null) as attr12 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '13', cb.attribute_name))),null) as attr13 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '14', cb.attribute_name))),null) as attr14 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '15', cb.attribute_name))),null) as attr15
,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ADDITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '01', cb.attribute_name))),null) as add_attr01 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ADDITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '02', cb.attribute_name))),null) as add_attr02 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ADDITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '03', cb.attribute_name))),null) as add_attr03 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ADDITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '04', cb.attribute_name))),null) as add_attr04 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ADDITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '05', cb.attribute_name))),null) as add_attr05 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ADDITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '06', cb.attribute_name))),null) as add_attr06 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ADDITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '07', cb.attribute_name))),null) as add_attr07 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ADDITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '08', cb.attribute_name))),null) as add_attr08 ,nvl(max (decode(cb.attribute_type, 'ADDITEM',decode(cb.attribute_code, '09', cb.attribute_name))),null) as add_attr09 from stx_dis_sd_catalog_attribute cb where cb.attribute_type = 'ITEM'
and cb.catalog_code = #{catalog_code}
group by cb.catalog_code

select t1.part_family_code ,t2.category_code1 ,t2.category_code2 ,t2.category_code3 from stx_dis_sd_catalog t1 ,stx_dis_sd_category t2 where t1.catalog_code = #{catalog_code} and t2.type_code = '01' and t1.category_id = t2.category_id and rownum = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.ATTRIBUTE_CODE FROM STX_DIS_SD_CATALOG_ATTRIBUTE A WHERE A.ATTRIBUTE_TYPE = 'ITEM' AND A.CATALOG_CODE = #{p_catalog_code} START WITH A.ATTRIBUTE_CODE = #{p_attribute_code} AND A.ASSY_ATTRIBUTE_CODE IS NOT NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR A.ATTRIBUTE_CODE = A.ASSY_ATTRIBUTE_CODE ) WHERE ATTRIBUTE_CODE <> #{p_attribute_code} ORDER BY 1
